items.Title: We are preparing the launcher!
items.description: We are starting to configure and prepare the launcher for the release of Stellar!

items.Title: LauncherV1 won't be updated.
items.description: We are starting to work on a LauncherV2, so the current launcher won't be updated anymore unless it's for important bug fixes.

items.Title: Private Test's in Stellar
items.description: We are currently testing the private test's in Stellar for a fresh release!

items.Title: Have you joined our server?
items.description: We are giving more updates about stellar development on our discord server, so join!

items.Title: News without Launcher
items.description: We have released this website to see news without opening the launcher!
